name: Nemaura Medical, Inc.
description: Nemaura Medical, Inc. is a medical technology company focused on the development of advanced glucose monitoring solutions and other innovative health technologies. Founded in 2011, the company is dedicated to improving the quality of life for patients with diabetes and related conditions through its proprietary non-invasive glucose monitoring systems. Nemaura's flagship product, the sugarBEAT®, is a non-invasive continuous glucose monitoring device designed to provide users with real-time glucose readings without the need for finger pricks or invasive sensors. In addition to glucose monitoring, Nemaura is exploring applications in various therapeutic areas, including weight management and the management of other chronic conditions. The company's mission is to empower patients to take control of their health and well-being through user-friendly and effective monitoring solutions. Nemaura is committed to research and development, with a focus on integrating digital health technologies and data analytics to enhance patient engagement and outcomes. As the global diabetes epidemic continues to rise, Nemaura Medical, Inc. is positioned to play a significant role in transforming diabetes management and improving the lives of millions of patients worldwide.
